goal: Integrate external research for exponential enhancement
final_decision: Prioritize graph-based reasoning transformation + LangGraph + NAS integration
decision_rationale: Research reveals sequential dialectics as bottleneck. Graph reasoning enables parallel synthesis, uncovering hidden connections. Combined with safe self-modification via NAS and enhanced coordination via LangGraph = exponential capability leap.
lessons_learned: External intelligence reveals blind spots internal analysis cannot
Graph reasoning is paradigm shift from tree-based dialectics
Production systems use state persistence we lack
Safe self-modification requires NAS + formal verification
Knowledge representation bottleneck solvable with hybrid vector-graph DBs
XAI integration critical for trust in autonomous decisions
Emergent behaviors in multi-agent need detection/control
